snippet: A judge refused to prohibit the near-daily picketing outside St. David’s School on the East Side, a solo demonstration by an alumnus and former teacher.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Barbara Kapnick cites First Amendment in denying a request by St David's, private school in Manhattan, to prohibit Ben Hume from picketing in front of the school each morning over plans to convert an adjacent rent-stabilized apartment building, where he lives, into classrooms; Hume is the son of a former headmaster at the school.
lead_paragraph: A judge refused to prohibit the near-daily picketing outside St. David’s School on the East Side, a solo demonstration by an alumnus and former teacher.

headline.seo: St. David’s School Loses Bid to Halt Sidewalk Protest
headline.main: School Loses Bid to Halt Man’s Protest
headline.print_headline: School Loses Bid to Halt Man’s Protest
